event.name: The Mapping Impactful Media Literacy Project for Media Literacy Week
event.shortDescription: Learn more about the project here: https://mappingimpactfulml.org/

description.html: Over the course of 2020 and 2021, The Mapping Impactful Media Literacy Project has explored how impact in media literacy interventions is understood, developed indicators for impactful practice, and designed a field guide for educators that facilitates alignment with indicators for impact. Join the conversation with the research team as they review their final report and findings and showcase their field guide.
